# adjustsImageWhenHighlighted

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the image changes when the button is highlighted.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var adjustsImageWhenHighlighted: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the image is drawn lighter when the button is highlighted. The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].

## Button presentation

- **adjustsImageWhenDisabled**: A Boolean value that determines whether the image changes when the button is disabled.
- **showsTouchWhenHighlighted**: A Boolean value that determines whether tapping the button causes it to glow.
